about_the_game:
Last Mind Standing is a first person shooter that takes place inside a very powerful mind, trained to defend itself against intruders at all cost.

Lots of powers, wepons and abilities at your disposal to decimate everything in sight. Avoid all obstacles and traps. Keep moving, never stop.



-Left hand: Powers.
-Right hand: Weapons.
-Leg: Melee (and Parry!)
You can use all of them at once.

Ammo? Who needs that. Just mow down enemies and parry projectiles to fill up the meter and then use your powers to cause even more destruction, or heal yourself if you need it.



Pay attention to your surroundings. You never know where your subconscious will place some helpful upgrades that will give you some peace of mind.

Abhorrent creations. Impossible places. Relentless enemies. Deathly traps. Legit nightmare fuel. Will you let them stop you?

Difficulty selection and three game modes: Normal, Extra Lives and Permadeath.

Metal soundtrack and skippable cutscenes for those who only care about gameplay.

Are you ready to be… mind-blown?

short_description: When you need answers, you ask questions. When you don’t get them, there is always another way, although it won’t be easy. Put the helmet on, lay down, close your eyes, take a deep breath and relax. In a few moments, nightmares will get real.
